text: Donald George Brewer (born September 3, 1948) is an American drummer. He is best known as the drummer, co-lead vocalist and only constant member of rock band Grand Funk Railroad. Other bands he was a member of are Terry Knight and the Pack and Bob Seger's Silver Bullet Band. Brewer was born in Flint, Michigan. He is married to Sunny Quinn. The couple have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American rock drummers Category:American rock singers Category:Musicians from Michigan Category:People from Flint, Michigan
title: Don Brewer
